trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType" /> não pode ser <see cref="F:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Attribute" /> ou <see cref="F:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Namespace" />.

trans-unit.source: Moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to the following element of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType" /> specified in document order.
trans-unit.target: Move o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> para o próximo elemento do <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType" /> especificado na ordem do documento.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> moved successfully; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> foi movido com êxito; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> method does not move to attribute or namespace nodes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> método não move para nós de atributo ou namespace.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> parameter value is <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Attribute> or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Namespace>, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> method returns `false` and the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> é o valor do parâmetro <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Attribute> ou <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Namespace>, o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> método retorna `false` e a posição do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> é alterada.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> method returns `false`, the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> método `false`, a posição do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> é alterada.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is moved from the root of the `contosoBooks.xml` file to the following `bookstore` element.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo a seguir, o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> é movido da raiz de `contosoBooks.xml` arquivo para o seguinte `bookstore` elemento.

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa o arquivo `contosoBooks.xml` como entrada.

trans-unit.source: The local name of the element.
trans-unit.target: O nome local do elemento.

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the element.
trans-unit.target: O URI do namespace do elemento.

trans-unit.source: Moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to the element with the local name and namespace URI specified in document order.
trans-unit.target: Move o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> para o elemento com o nome local e o URI do namespace especificado na ordem do documento.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> moved successfully; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> foi movido com êxito; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> method returns `false`, the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> método `false`, a posição do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> é alterada.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is moved from the root of the `contosoBooks.xml` file to the first `price` element.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo a seguir, o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> é movido da raiz de `contosoBooks.xml` arquivo ao primeiro `price` elemento.

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa o arquivo `contosoBooks.xml` como entrada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType" /> of the element.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType" /> do elemento.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType" /> cannot be <see cref="F:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Attribute" /> or <see cref="F:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Namespace" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType" /> não pode ser <see cref="F:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Attribute" /> ou <see cref="F:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Namespace" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> object positioned on the element boundary which the current <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> will not move past while searching for the following element.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> posicionado no limite do elemento além do qual o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> atual não passará ao procurar o elemento seguinte.

trans-unit.source: Moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to the following element of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType" /> specified, to the boundary specified, in document order.
trans-unit.target: Move o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> para o próximo elemento do <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType" /> especificado, até o limite especificado, na ordem do documento.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> moved successfully; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> foi movido com êxito; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> method does not move to attribute or namespace nodes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> método não move para nós de atributo ou namespace.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> parameter value is <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Attribute> or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Namespace>, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> method returns `false` and the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> é o valor do parâmetro <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Attribute> ou <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Namespace>, o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> método retorna `false` e a posição do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> é alterada.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> boundary passed as a parameter is not positioned after the position of the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> it is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> limite passado como um parâmetro não está posicionado após a posição do atual <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> é ignorado.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> boundary passed as a parameter is `null` the next following node with the specified <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> is located in document order.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> é passado como um parâmetro de limite `null` o próximo nó com especificado <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> está localizada na ordem do documento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> methods cannot be used to move to attribute or namespace nodes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> métodos não podem ser usados para mover para nós de atributo ou namespace.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> boundary passed as a parameter is positioned over an attribute or namespace node, it is equivalent to the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> boundary parameter having been positioned on the first child node of its parent element.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> limite passado como um parâmetro é posicionado sobre um nó de atributo ou namespace, isso é equivalente ao <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> parâmetro limite ter sido posicionado no primeiro nó filho do seu elemento pai.

trans-unit.source: This ensures that the parent element of the attribute or namespace node that the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> boundary parameter is positioned on can be matched by this method.
trans-unit.target: Isso assegura que o elemento pai do nó de atributo ou namespace que o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> parâmetro de limite é posicionado no pode ser correspondido por este método.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> method returns `false`, the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> método `false`, a posição do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> é alterada.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is moved from the root of the `contosoBooks.xml` file to the following `price` element.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo a seguir, o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> é movido da raiz de `contosoBooks.xml` arquivo para o seguinte `price` elemento.

trans-unit.source: A clone of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object is made using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Clone%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Um clone do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> objeto é feito usando o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Clone%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The cloned <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>, positioned on the `price` element, will be used as a boundary.
trans-unit.target: O clonado <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>, posicionadas no `price` elemento, será usado como um limite.

trans-unit.source: Changes in the position of the cloned <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> do not affect the original <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: Alterações na posição do clonado <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> não afetam o original <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.

trans-unit.source: The original <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is moved back to the root of the `contosoBooks.xml` file using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToRoot%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O original <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> é movido para a raiz do `contosoBooks.xml` arquivo usando o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToRoot%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The title and first and last name of the author are retrieved using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> method and an <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Text>.
trans-unit.target: O nome e sobrenome do autor e título são recuperadas usando o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> método e uma <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Text>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> method will return true until the `price` element boundary is reached.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> método retornará true até que o `price` limites do elemento é atingido.

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa o arquivo `contosoBooks.xml` como entrada.

trans-unit.source: The local name of the element.
trans-unit.target: O nome local do elemento.

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the element.
trans-unit.target: O URI do namespace do elemento.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> object positioned on the element boundary which the current <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> will not move past while searching for the following element.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> posicionado no limite do elemento além do qual o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> atual não passará ao procurar o elemento seguinte.

trans-unit.source: Moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to the element with the local name and namespace URI specified, to the boundary specified, in document order.
trans-unit.target: Move o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> para o elemento com o nome local e o URI do namespace especificado, até o limite especificado, na ordem do documento.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> moved successfully; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> foi movido com êxito; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> boundary passed as a parameter is not positioned after the position of the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> it is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> limite passado como um parâmetro não está posicionado após a posição do atual <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> é ignorado.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> boundary parameter is `null`, the following element with the local name and namespace URI specified is located in document order.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> parâmetro de limite é `null`, o seguinte elemento com o nome local e o namespace URI especificado está localizado na ordem do documento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> methods cannot be used to move to attribute or namespace nodes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> métodos não podem ser usados para mover para nós de atributo ou namespace.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> boundary passed as a parameter is positioned over an attribute or namespace node, it is equivalent to the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> boundary parameter having been positioned on the first child node of its parent element.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> limite passado como um parâmetro é posicionado sobre um nó de atributo ou namespace, isso é equivalente ao <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> parâmetro limite ter sido posicionado no primeiro nó filho do seu elemento pai.

trans-unit.source: This ensures that the parent element of the attribute or namespace node that the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> boundary parameter is positioned on can be matched by this method.
trans-unit.target: Isso assegura que o elemento pai do nó de atributo ou namespace que o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> parâmetro de limite é posicionado no pode ser correspondido por este método.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> method returns `false`, the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> método `false`, a posição do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> é alterada.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is moved from the root of the `contosoBooks.xml` file to the following `book` element.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo a seguir, o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> é movido da raiz de `contosoBooks.xml` arquivo para o seguinte `book` elemento.

trans-unit.source: A clone of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object is made using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Clone%2A> method and is moved from the `book` element to the following `first-name` element.
trans-unit.target: Um clone do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> objeto é feito usando o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Clone%2A> método e é movido do `book` elemento para o seguinte `first-name` elemento.

trans-unit.source: The cloned <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>, positioned on the `first-name` element, will be used as a boundary.
trans-unit.target: O clonado <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>, posicionadas no `first-name` elemento, será usado como um limite.

trans-unit.source: Changes in the position of the cloned <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> do not affect the original <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: Alterações na posição do clonado <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> não afetam o original <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.

trans-unit.source: The original <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> then attempts to move to the following `price` element using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> method with the boundary passed as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: O original <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> , em seguida, tenta mover para o seguinte `price` elemento usando o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> método com o limite é passado como um parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: This move fails because the following `price` element is beyond the boundary.
trans-unit.target: Essa movimentação falhará porque o seguinte `price` elemento está além do limite.

trans-unit.source: The original <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> then attempts to move to the following `title` element which is before the boundary using the same method and succeeds.
trans-unit.target: O original <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> , em seguida, tenta mover para o seguinte `title` elemento que está antes do limite usando o mesmo método e será bem-sucedida.

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa o arquivo `contosoBooks.xml` como entrada.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> representing the <c>ID</c> value of the node to which you want to move.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa o valor da <c>ID</c> do nó ao qual você deseja mover.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves to the node that has an attribute of type <c>ID</c> whose value matches the specified <see cref="T:System.String" />.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, move para o nó que tem um atributo do tipo <c>ID</c> cujo valor corresponde ao <see cref="T:System.String" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is successful moving; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> tiver êxito na movimentação; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="false" />, the position of the navigator is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se for <see langword="false" />, a posição do navegador permanecerá inalterada.

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to identify nodes by unique `ID` provided the source document explicitly declares attributes of type `ID` using a DTD.
trans-unit.target: Esse método pode ser usado para identificar nós por exclusivo `ID` desde que o documento de origem declara explicitamente os atributos do tipo `ID` usando um DTD.

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose the following XML data, `<data><x a="a1"/></data>`, was loaded using a DTD that included the following: `<!ATTLIST x a ID #REQUIRED>`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, suponha que os dados XML a seguir, `<data><x a="a1"/></data>`, foi carregada usando um DTD que incluiu o seguinte: `<!ATTLIST x a ID #REQUIRED>`.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> was positioned somewhere in the XML data, calling `MoveToId("a1")` positions the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> on the element node `x`.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> foi posicionado em algum lugar nos dados XML, chamando `MoveToId("a1")` posições de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> no nó de elemento `x`.

trans-unit.source: The namespace prefix of the namespace node.
trans-unit.target: O prefixo do namespace do nó de namespace.

trans-unit.source: Moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to the namespace node with the specified namespace prefix.
trans-unit.target: Move o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> para o nó de namespace com o prefixo de namespace especificado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is successful moving to the specified namespace; <see langword="false" /> if a matching namespace node was not found, or if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is not positioned on an element node.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> tiver êxito na movimentação para o namespace especificado; <see langword="false" /> se um nó de namespace correspondente não for encontrado ou se o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> não estiver posicionado em um nó de elemento.

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="false" />, the position of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se for <see langword="false" />, a posição do <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> permanecerá inalterada.

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> has been moved to the namespace node, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A> property reflects the name of the namespace.
trans-unit.target: Após o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> foi movido para o nó de namespace, o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A> propriedade reflete o nome do namespace.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on a namespace node, the methods <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> are not applicable.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> está posicionado em um nó de namespace, os métodos <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, e <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> não são aplicáveis.

trans-unit.source: These methods always return `false` and do not change the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: Esses métodos retornam sempre `false` e não altera a posição do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.

trans-unit.source: Rather, you can call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextNamespace%2A> to move to the next namespace node.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, você pode chamar <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextNamespace%2A> para mover para o próximo nó de namespace.

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on a namespace node, you can call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> to move back to the element node.
trans-unit.target: Após o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> está posicionado em um nó de namespace, você pode chamar <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> para voltar ao nó de elemento.

trans-unit.source: For a definition of namespace nodes, see section 5.4 of the W3C XML Path Language (XPath) recommendation located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#data-model.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma definição de nós de namespace, consulte a seção 5.4 da recomendação W3C XML Path Language (XPath) localizado em http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#data-model.

trans-unit.source: Moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to the next sibling node of the current node.
trans-unit.target: Move <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> o nó seguir irmãos do nó atual.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to the next sibling node of the current node.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, move o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> para o próximo nó irmão do nó atual.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is successful moving to the next sibling node; otherwise, <see langword="false" /> if there are no more siblings or if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is currently positioned on an attribute node.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> tiver êxito na movimentação para o próximo nó irmão; caso contrário, <see langword="false" /> se não houver mais nenhum irmão ou se o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> estiver atualmente posicionado em um nó de atributo.

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="false" />, the position of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se for <see langword="false" />, a posição do <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> permanecerá inalterada.

trans-unit.source: The following example iterates over the node tree recursively, and displays information about element and text nodes.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir itera sobre o nó árvore recursivamente e exibe informações sobre o elemento e nós de texto.

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `books.xml` file as an input.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa o arquivo `books.xml` como entrada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType" /> of the sibling node to move to.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType" /> do nó irmão para movimentação.

trans-unit.source: Moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to the next sibling node of the current node that matches the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType" /> specified.
trans-unit.target: Move o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> para o próximo nó irmão do nó atual que corresponde ao <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is successful moving to the next sibling node; otherwise, <see langword="false" /> if there are no more siblings or if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is currently positioned on an attribute node.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> tiver êxito na movimentação para o próximo nó irmão; caso contrário, <see langword="false" /> se não houver mais nenhum irmão ou se o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> estiver atualmente posicionado em um nó de atributo.

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="false" />, the position of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se for <see langword="false" />, a posição do <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> permanecerá inalterada.

trans-unit.source: The return value of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A> method depends on the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the current node and the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the next sibling node to move to.
trans-unit.target: O valor de retorno a <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A> depende do método de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> do nó atual e o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> do nó irmão Avançar para ir para.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the different <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> nodes and the sibling nodes they can move to.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra os diferentes <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> nós e os eles podem migrar para os nós irmãos.

trans-unit.source: Current Node's XPathNodeType
trans-unit.target: XPathNodeType do nó atual

trans-unit.source: Sibling Node's XPathNodeType
trans-unit.target: XPathNodeType irmão do nó

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.ProcessingInstruction>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Comment>, or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Text>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.ProcessingInstruction>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Comment> ou <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Text>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.ProcessingInstruction>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Comment>, or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Text>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.ProcessingInstruction>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Comment> ou <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Text>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.ProcessingInstruction>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Comment>, or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Text>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.ProcessingInstruction>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Comment> ou <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Text>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.ProcessingInstruction>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Comment>, or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Text>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.ProcessingInstruction>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Comment> ou <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Text>.

trans-unit.source: All other <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> values
trans-unit.target: Todos os outros <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> valores

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: nenhuma.

trans-unit.source: The local name of the next sibling node to move to.
trans-unit.target: O nome local do próximo nó irmão para o qual mover.

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the next sibling node to move to.
trans-unit.target: O URI do namespace do próximo nó irmão para o qual mover.

trans-unit.source: Moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to the next sibling node with the local name and namespace URI specified.
trans-unit.target: Move o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> para o próximo nó irmão com o nome local e o URI do namespace especificado.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is successful moving to the next sibling node; <see langword="false" /> if there are no more siblings, or if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is currently positioned on an attribute node.
trans-unit.target: Retorna <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> tiver êxito na movimentação para o próximo nó irmão; <see langword="false" /> se não houver mais nenhum irmão ou se o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> estiver atualmente posicionado em um nó de atributo.

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="false" />, the position of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se for <see langword="false" />, a posição do <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> permanecerá inalterada.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to the next attribute.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, move o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> para o atributo seguinte.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is successful moving to the next attribute; <see langword="false" /> if there are no more attributes.
trans-unit.target: Retorna <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> tiver êxito na movimentação para o próximo atributo; <see langword="false" /> se não houver mais nenhum atributo.

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="false" />, the position of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se for <see langword="false" />, a posição do <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> permanecerá inalterada.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is not currently positioned on an attribute, this method returns `false` and the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> does not change.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> não está atualmente posicionado em um atributo, esse método retorna `false` e a posição do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> não é alterado.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an attribute, the methods <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> methods are not applicable.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> está posicionado em um atributo, os métodos <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, e <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> métodos não são aplicáveis.

trans-unit.source: These methods always return `false` and do not change the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: Esses métodos retornam sempre `false` e não altera a posição do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an attribute, you can call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> to move to the owner element.
trans-unit.target: Após o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> está posicionado em um atributo, você pode chamar <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> para mover para o elemento do proprietário.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirstAttribute%2A> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextAttribute%2A> methods to display all the attributes for each book in the `books.xml` file.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirstAttribute%2A> e <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextAttribute%2A> métodos para exibir todos os atributos para cada livro `books.xml` arquivo.

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `books.xml` file as an input.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa o arquivo `books.xml` como entrada.

trans-unit.source: Moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to the next namespace node.
trans-unit.target: Move o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> para o próximo nó de namespace.

trans-unit.source: Moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to the next namespace node.
trans-unit.target: Move o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> para o próximo nó de namespace.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is successful moving to the next namespace node; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> tiver êxito na movimentação para o próximo nó de namespace; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="false" />, the position of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se for <see langword="false" />, a posição do <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> permanecerá inalterada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> class returns namespace nodes in reverse document order.
trans-unit.target: Os nós de namespace de retornos de classe de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> na ordem inversa do documento.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextNamespace%2A> essentially moves to the namespace node above the one in the current scope.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextNamespace%2A> essencialmente move para o nó de namespace acima no escopo atual.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is not currently positioned on a namespace node, this method returns `false` and the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> does not change.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> não está atualmente posicionado em um nó de namespace, esse método retorna `false` e a posição do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> não é alterado.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on a namespace node, the methods <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> are not applicable.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> está posicionado em um nó de namespace, os métodos <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, e <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> não são aplicáveis.

trans-unit.source: These methods always return `false` and do not change the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: Esses métodos retornam sempre `false` e não altera a posição do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an namespace node, call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> to move back to the element node.
trans-unit.target: Após o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> está posicionado em um nó de namespace, chamada <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> para voltar ao nó de elemento.

trans-unit.source: For a definition of namespace nodes, see section 5.4 of the W3C XML Path Language (XPath) recommendation located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#data-model.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma definição de nós de namespace, consulte a seção 5.4 da recomendação W3C XML Path Language (XPath) localizado em http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#data-model.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNamespaceScope" /> value describing the namespace scope.
trans-unit.target: Um valor <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNamespaceScope" /> que descreve o escopo do namespace.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to the next namespace node matching the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNamespaceScope" /> specified.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, move o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> para o próximo nó de namespace que corresponde ao <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNamespaceScope" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is successful moving to the next namespace node; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> tiver êxito na movimentação para o próximo nó de namespace; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="false" />, the position of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se for <see langword="false" />, a posição do <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> permanecerá inalterada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> class returns namespace nodes in reverse document order.
trans-unit.target: Os nós de namespace de retornos de classe de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> na ordem inversa do documento.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is not currently positioned on a namespace node, this method returns `false` and the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> does not change.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> não está atualmente posicionado em um nó de namespace, esse método retorna `false` e a posição do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> não é alterado.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on a namespace node, the methods <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> are not applicable.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> está posicionado em um nó de namespace, os métodos <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, e <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> não são aplicáveis.

trans-unit.source: These methods always return `false` and do not change the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: Esses métodos retornam sempre `false` e não altera a posição do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an namespace node, call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> to move back to the element node.
trans-unit.target: Após o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> está posicionado em um nó de namespace, chamada <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> para voltar ao nó de elemento.

trans-unit.source: For a definition of namespace nodes, see section 5.4 of the W3C XML Path Language (XPath) recommendation located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#data-model.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma definição de nós de namespace, consulte a seção 5.4 da recomendação W3C XML Path Language (XPath) localizado em http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#data-model.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to the parent node of the current node.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, move o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> para o nó pai do nó atual.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is successful moving to the parent node of the current node; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Retornará <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> for bem-sucedido ao mover para o nó pai do nó atual; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="false" />, the position of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se for <see langword="false" />, a posição do <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> permanecerá inalterada.

trans-unit.source: The return value of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> method depends on the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the current node, and the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the parent node to move to.
trans-unit.target: O valor de retorno de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> depende do método de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> do nó atual e o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> do nó pai para mover para.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the different <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> nodes, and the parent nodes they can move to.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra os diferentes <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> nós e os nós pai que eles podem migrar para.

trans-unit.source: XPathNodeType
trans-unit.target: XPathNodeType

trans-unit.source: Parent Node
trans-unit.target: Nó pai

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Root> nodes do not have parents.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Root> nós não possui pais.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element> or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Root> node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element> ou <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Root> nó.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element> node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element> Nó.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element> node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element> Nó.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element> node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element> Nó.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element> or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Root> node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element> ou <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Root> nó.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element> or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Root> node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element> ou <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Root> nó.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element> or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Root> node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element> ou <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Root> nó.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element> or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Root> node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element> ou <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Root> nó.

trans-unit.source: For an example of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> method, see the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.CreateAttribute%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> método, consulte o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.CreateAttribute%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to the previous sibling node of the current node.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, move o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> para o nó irmão anterior ao nó atual.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is successful moving to the previous sibling node; otherwise, <see langword="false" /> if there is no previous sibling node or if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is currently positioned on an attribute node.
trans-unit.target: Retorna <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> tiver êxito na movimentação para o nó irmão anterior; caso contrário, <see langword="false" /> se não houver nó irmão anterior ou se o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> estiver atualmente posicionado em um nó de atributo.

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="false" />, the position of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se for <see langword="false" />, a posição do <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> permanecerá inalterada.

trans-unit.source: Moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to the root node that the current node belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Move o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> para o nó raiz ao qual o nó atual pertence.

trans-unit.source: All nodes belong to one and only one document.
trans-unit.target: Todos os nós pertencem a apenas um documento.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, this method is always successful.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, esse método sempre é bem-sucedida.

trans-unit.source: For an example of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToRoot%2A> method, see the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToRoot%2A> método, consulte o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the qualified name of the current node.
trans-unit.target: Quando é substituído em uma classe derivada, obtém o nome qualificado do nó atual.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the qualified <see cref="P:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name" /> of the current node, or <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> if the current node does not have a name (for example, text or comment nodes).
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> que contém o <see cref="P:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name" /> qualificado do nó atual ou <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> se o nó atual não tem um nome (por exemplo, nós de texto ou comentário).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A> returned depends on the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the current node.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A> retornado depende do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> do nó atual.

trans-unit.source: For example, the name for the `<bk:book>` element is `bk:book`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o nome para o `<bk:book>` elemento é `bk:book`.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the value returned by the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A> property, based on the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the current node.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir lista o valor retornado pelo <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A> propriedade, com base no <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> do nó atual.

trans-unit.source: XPathNodeType
trans-unit.target: XPathNodeType

trans-unit.source: Property Value
trans-unit.target: Valor de propriedade

trans-unit.source: The qualified name of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element>.
trans-unit.target: O nome qualificado do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element>.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, `<bk:book>`, the name of the element node is `bk:book`.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo a seguir, `<bk:book>`, o nome do nó de elemento é `bk:book`.

trans-unit.source: The qualified name of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Attribute>.
trans-unit.target: O nome qualificado do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Attribute>.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, `<book bk:genre='novel'>`, the name of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Attribute> node is `bk:genre`.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo a seguir, `<book bk:genre='novel'>`, o nome do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Attribute> nó é `bk:genre`.

trans-unit.source: The prefix associated with the namespace URI.
trans-unit.target: O prefixo associado com o URI de namespace.

trans-unit.source: In the following namespace declaration, `xmlns:bk='urn:samples'`, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A> property returns `bk`.
trans-unit.target: Na seguinte declaração de namespace, `xmlns:bk='urn:samples'`, o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A> propriedade retorna `bk`.

trans-unit.source: The target of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.ProcessingInstruction>.
trans-unit.target: O destino do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.ProcessingInstruction>.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, `<?xml-stylesheet type='text/xsl' href= 'books.xsl'?>`, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A> property returns `xml-stylesheet`.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo a seguir, `<?xml-stylesheet type='text/xsl' href= 'books.xsl'?>`, o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A> propriedade retorna `xml-stylesheet`.

trans-unit.source: All other <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> nodes
trans-unit.target: Todos os outros <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> nós

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The following example iterates over the node tree recursively, and displays information about <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Text> nodes.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir itera sobre o nó árvore recursivamente e exibe informações sobre <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element> e <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Text> nós.

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `books.xml` file as an input.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa o arquivo `books.xml` como entrada.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the namespace URI of the current node.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, obtém o URI de namespace do nó atual.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the namespace URI of the current node, or <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> if the current node has no namespace URI.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que contém o namespace URI do nó atual, ou <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> se o nó atual não tiver nenhum URI de namespace.

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI returned depends on the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the current node.
trans-unit.target: O namespace URI retornado depende do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> do nó atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.NamespaceURI%2A> property returns `urn:samples` for the node `<bk:book xmlns:bk='urn:samples'>`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.NamespaceURI%2A> propriedade retorna `urn:samples` para o nó `<bk:book xmlns:bk='urn:samples'>`.

trans-unit.source: Only <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Attribute><xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> nodes can have a namespace URI.
trans-unit.target: Somente <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element> e <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Attribute> <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> nós podem ter um URI de namespace.

trans-unit.source: The following example iterates over the node tree recursively, and displays information about <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Text> nodes.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir itera sobre o nó árvore recursivamente e exibe informações sobre <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element> e <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Text> nós.

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `books.xml` file as an input.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa o arquivo `books.xml` como entrada.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNameTable" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" />.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, obtém o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNameTable" /> do <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNameTable" /> object enabling you to get the atomized version of a <see cref="T:System.String" /> within the XML document.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNameTable" /> objeto permitindo que você obtenha a versão atomizada de um <see cref="T:System.String" /> dentro do documento XML.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable> stores atomized strings of any local name, namespace URI, and prefix used by the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable> armazena cadeias de caracteres atomizadas de qualquer nome local, o URI de namespace e o prefixo usado pelo <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.

trans-unit.source: This means that when the same <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A> is returned multiple times (like "book"), the same <xref:System.String> object is returned for that <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Isso significa que, quando o mesmo <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A> é retornado várias vezes (como "manual"), o mesmo <xref:System.String> objeto é retornado para que <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A>.

trans-unit.source: This makes it possible to write efficient code that does object comparisons on these strings, instead of expensive string comparisons.
trans-unit.target: Isso torna possível escrever código eficiente que o objeto comparações sobre essas cadeias de caracteres, em vez de comparações de cadeia de caracteres caro.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEqualityComparer" /> used for equality comparison of <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEqualityComparer" /> usado para a comparação de igualdade de objetos <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEqualityComparer" /> used for equality comparison of <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEqualityComparer" /> usado para comparação de igualdade de <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.NavigatorComparer%2A> property allows <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> objects to be compared on the basis of position rather than reference to the object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.NavigatorComparer%2A> propriedade permite <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> objetos a ser comparado com base na posição em vez de referência ao objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.ComparePosition%2A> and <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> methods implemented by this class are based on the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> objects passed as parameters.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.ComparePosition%2A> e <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> métodos implementados por esta classe baseiam-se na posição do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> objetos passados como parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A> method implemented by this class uses the properties of the node such as its local name and namespace URI to create a hash code for the node.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A> método implementado por essa classe usa as propriedades do nó como seu nome local e o URI de namespace para criar um código hash para o nó.

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the use of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.NavigatorComparer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir ilustra o uso do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.NavigatorComparer%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `books.xml` file as an input.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa o arquivo `books.xml` como entrada.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType" /> of the current node.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, obtém o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType" /> do nó atual.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType" /> values representing the current node.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType" /> que representa o nó atual.

trans-unit.source: The following example iterates over the node tree recursively, and displays information about <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Text> nodes.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir itera sobre o nó árvore recursivamente e exibe informações sobre <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element> e <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Text> nós.

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `books.xml` file as an input.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa o arquivo `books.xml` como entrada.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the markup representing the opening and closing tags of the current node and its child nodes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a marcação que representa as marcas de abertura e fechamento do nó atual e de seus nós filho.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the markup representing the opening and closing tags of the current node and its child nodes.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que contém a marcação que representa as marcas de abertura e fechamento do nó atual e seus nós filho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.InnerXml%2A> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.OuterXml%2A> properties are not very efficient.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.InnerXml%2A> e <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.OuterXml%2A> propriedades não são muito eficientes.

trans-unit.source: If performance is a priority, it is more efficient to use the node navigation methods of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> to get values of child nodes.
trans-unit.target: Se o desempenho for uma prioridade, é mais eficiente usar os métodos de navegação do nó do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> para obter valores de nós filho.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.OuterXml%2A> property to display the contents of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file, its child nodes, and its opening and closing tags in the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.OuterXml%2A> propriedade para exibir o conteúdo do primeiro `book` elemento o `contosoBooks.xml` arquivo, os nós filho e suas marcas abertura e fechamento <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa o arquivo `contosoBooks.xml` como entrada.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the namespace prefix associated with the current node.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, obtém o prefixo de namespace associado com o nó atual.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the namespace prefix associated with the current node.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que contém o prefixo de namespace associado ao nó atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Prefix%2A> property gets the namespace prefix associated with the current node.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Prefix%2A> propriedade obtém o prefixo de namespace associado ao nó atual.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Prefix%2A> property returns `bk` for the `<bk:book>` element.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Prefix%2A> propriedade retorna `bk` para o `<bk:book>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: If a prefix does not exist, or the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the current node is not <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element> or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Attribute>, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Prefix%2A> property returns <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Se não existir um prefixo, ou o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> do nó atual não é <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element> ou <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Attribute>, o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Prefix%2A> propriedade retorna <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The following example iterates over the node tree recursively, and displays information about <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Text> nodes.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir itera sobre o nó árvore recursivamente e exibe informações sobre <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element> e <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Text> nós.

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `books.xml` file as an input.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa o arquivo `books.xml` como entrada.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new child node at the beginning of the list of child nodes of the current node.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo nó filho no início da lista de nós filho do nó atual.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> object used to create a new child node at the beginning of the list of child nodes of the current node.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> usado para criar um novo nó filho no início da lista de nós filho do nó atual.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> object used to create a new child node at the beginning of the list of child nodes of the current node.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> usado para criar um novo nó filho no início da lista de nós filho do nó atual.

trans-unit.source: Prepending a child node adds the new node to the beginning of the list of child nodes for the current node.
trans-unit.target: Acrescentando um nó filho adiciona o novo nó para o início da lista de nós filho do nó atual.

trans-unit.source: For example, when three child nodes exist for an element, the prepended node becomes the first child node.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando existem três nós filho de um elemento, o nó antecedendo se torna o primeiro nó filho.

trans-unit.source: If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum nó filho existir, um novo nó filho é criado.

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.PrependChild%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Eis as observações importantes a considerar ao usar o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.PrependChild%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The new child node is not inserted until the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object is called.
trans-unit.target: O novo nó filho não é inserido até que o <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close%2A> método o <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> objeto é chamado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.PrependChild%2A> method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an element node.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.PrependChild%2A> método é válido somente quando o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> está posicionado em um nó de elemento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.PrependChild%2A> method does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.PrependChild%2A> método não afeta a posição do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, a new `pages` child element is prepended to the beginning of the list of child elements of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object returned from the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.PrependChild%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo a seguir, um novo `pages` elemento filho é anexado ao início da lista de elementos filho do primeiro `book` elemento o `contosoBooks.xml` arquivo usando o <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> objeto retornado do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.PrependChild%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa o arquivo `contosoBooks.xml` como entrada.

trans-unit.source: The current node the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is positioned on does not allow a new child node to be prepended.
trans-unit.target: O nó atual no qual o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> está posicionado não permite que um novo nó filho seja anexado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> não dá suporte à edição.

trans-unit.source: The XML data string for the new child node.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de dados XML do novo nó filho.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new child node at the beginning of the list of child nodes of the current node using the XML string specified.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo nó filho no início da lista de nós filho do nó atual usando a cadeia de caracteres XML especificada.

trans-unit.source: Prepending a child node adds the new node to the beginning of the list of child nodes for the current node.
trans-unit.target: Acrescentando um nó filho adiciona o novo nó para o início da lista de nós filho do nó atual.

trans-unit.source: For example, when three child nodes exist for an element, the prepended node becomes the first child node.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando existem três nós filho de um elemento, o nó antecedendo se torna o primeiro nó filho.

trans-unit.source: If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum nó filho existir, um novo nó filho é criado.

trans-unit.source: To create a new element node, include all XML syntax in the XML string parameter.
trans-unit.target: Para criar um novo nó de elemento, inclua toda a sintaxe XML no parâmetro de cadeia de caracteres XML.

trans-unit.source: The string for a new `book` node is `PrependChild("<book/>")`.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres para um novo `book` nó é `PrependChild("<book/>")`.

trans-unit.source: The string for appending the text "book" to the current node's text node is `PrependChild("book")`.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres para acrescentar o texto "livro" para o nó de texto do nó atual é `PrependChild("book")`.

trans-unit.source: If the XML string contains multiple nodes, all nodes are added.
trans-unit.target: Se a cadeia de caracteres XML contém vários nós, todos os nós são adicionados.

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.PrependChild%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Eis as observações importantes a considerar ao usar o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.PrependChild%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.PrependChild%2A> method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an element node.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.PrependChild%2A> método é válido somente quando o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> está posicionado em um nó de elemento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.PrependChild%2A> method does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.PrependChild%2A> método não afeta a posição do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.

trans-unit.source: The namespace prefix of the new child element (if any).
trans-unit.target: O prefixo de namespace do novo elemento filho (se houver).

trans-unit.target: O nome local do novo elemento filho (se houver).

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the new child element (if any).
trans-unit.target: O URI de namespace do novo elemento filho (se houver).

trans-unit.source: Creates a new child element at the beginning of the list of child nodes of the current node using the namespace prefix, local name, and namespace URI specified with the value specified.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo elemento filho no início da lista de nós filho do nó atual, usando o prefixo do namespace, o nome local e o URI do namespace especificado, com o valor especificado.

trans-unit.source: Prepending a child node adds the new node to the beginning of the list of child nodes for the current node.
trans-unit.target: Acrescentando um nó filho adiciona o novo nó para o início da lista de nós filho do nó atual.

trans-unit.source: For example, when three child nodes exist for an element, the prepended node becomes the first child node.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando existem três nós filho de um elemento, o nó antecedendo se torna o primeiro nó filho.

trans-unit.source: If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum nó filho existir, um novo nó filho é criado.

trans-unit.source: Namespace prefix and URI values can be obtained by using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupPrefix%2A> or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupNamespace%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Prefixo de Namespace e valores de URI podem ser obtidos usando o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupPrefix%2A> ou <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupNamespace%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: For example, the following syntax prepends a child element by using the in-scope namespace `xmlns:bk="http://www.contoso.com/books"`:
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, a sintaxe a seguir adiciona um elemento filho usando o namespace no escopo `xmlns:bk="http://www.contoso.com/books"`:

trans-unit.source: This creates the new child `<bk:pages/>` element.
trans-unit.target: Isso cria o novo filho `<bk:pages/>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.PrependChildElement%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Eis as observações importantes a considerar ao usar o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.PrependChildElement%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: If the namespace prefix specified is `null` or <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>, then the prefix for the namespace URI of the new element is obtained from the current namespaces in-scope.
trans-unit.target: Se o prefixo de namespace especificado for `null` ou <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>, em seguida, o prefixo do namespace URI do novo elemento é obtido a partir do atual namespaces em escopo.

trans-unit.source: If there is no namespace prefix assigned to the specified namespace URI at the current scope, then a namespace prefix is automatically generated.
trans-unit.target: Se houver um prefixo de namespace atribuído para o URI no escopo atual de espaço para nome especificado, um prefixo de namespace é gerado automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.PrependChildElement%2A> method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an element node.
