trans-unit.target: A tentativa de conversão em <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> não é válida.

trans-unit.source: Gets the .NET Framework <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the current node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Type" /> do .NET Framework do nó atual.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the current node.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework <see cref="T:System.Type" /> do nó atual.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="T:System.String" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <see cref="T:System.String" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueType%2A> property gets the .NET Framework <xref:System.Type> of the typed value of the current node.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueType%2A> propriedade obtém o .NET Framework <xref:System.Type> do valor digitado do nó atual.

trans-unit.source: For example, an element of type `xs:int` would have a <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueType%2A> of <xref:System.Int32> by default.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um elemento do tipo `xs:int` teria um <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueType%2A> de <xref:System.Int32> por padrão.

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueType%2A> could be any one of the valid types that can be mapped to `xs:int` such as <xref:System.Int16> or <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueType%2A> pode ser qualquer um dos tipos válidos que podem ser mapeados para `xs:int` como <xref:System.Int16> ou <xref:System.Double>.

trans-unit.source: If a node has no type, this is equivalent to the type annotation on the node being `xdt:untypedAtomic`.
trans-unit.target: Se um nó não tem um tipo, isso é equivalente à anotação de tipo no nó que está sendo `xdt:untypedAtomic`.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.ValueType%2A> property returns a string for the node.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.ValueType%2A> propriedade retorna uma cadeia de caracteres para o nó.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [suporte a tipo nas Classes System. XML](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the `contosoBooks.xml` XML file and `contosoBooks.xsd` XML Schema definition language (XSD) schema are used to create an <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo a seguir, o `contosoBooks.xml` arquivo XML e `contosoBooks.xsd` esquema de linguagem XSD de definição de esquema XML são usados para criar um <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The typed value of the `price` element is displayed using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.ValueType%2A> property and then returned as a string using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.ValueAs%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O valor digitado do `price` elemento é exibido usando o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.ValueType%2A> propriedade e, em seguida, é retornado como uma cadeia de caracteres usando o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.ValueAs%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa o arquivo `contosoBooks.xml` como entrada.

trans-unit.source: The example also takes the `contosoBooks.xsd` as an input.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo também usa `contosoBooks.xsd` como entrada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> object to stream to.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> para o qual transmitir.

trans-unit.source: Streams the current node and its child nodes to the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> object specified.
trans-unit.target: Transmite o nó atual e seus nós filho para o objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: Namespace declarations for the in-scope namespaces of the current node are inserted into the XML streamed to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object specified.
trans-unit.target: Declarações de Namespace para os namespaces no escopo do nó atual são inseridas no XML transmitido para o <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> o objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.WriteSubtree%2A> method is called on the first `book` element of the `books.xml` file, the `http://www.contoso.com/books` namespace declaration made at the top of the XML document will appear in the XML streamed to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object specified as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.WriteSubtree%2A> método é chamado no primeiro `book` elemento do `books.xml` arquivo, o `http://www.contoso.com/books` declaração de namespace feita na parte superior do documento XML será exibido no XML transmitido para o <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> o objeto especificado, conforme mostrado no exemplo a seguir.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.WriteSubtree%2A> method does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.WriteSubtree%2A> método não afeta a posição do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.WriteSubtree%2A> method on the first `book` element of the `contosoBooks.xml` file.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir ilustra o uso de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.WriteSubtree%2A> método no primeiro `book` elemento o `contosoBooks.xml` arquivo.

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa o arquivo `contosoBooks.xml` como entrada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <c>xml:lang</c> scope for the current node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o escopo <c>xml:lang</c> para o nó atual.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the value of the <c>xml:lang</c> scope, or <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> if the current node has no <c>xml:lang</c> scope value to return.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que contém o valor da <c>XML: lang</c> escopo, ou <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> se o nó atual não tiver nenhuma <c>XML: lang</c> escopo valor a ser retornado.

trans-unit.source: In the example XML below, when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on the `name` element, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.XmlLang%2A> property returns a scope of `en-us` indicating that the node is in the scope of a `xml:lang="en-us"` attribute.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo XML a seguir, quando o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> é posicionado no `name` elemento, o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.XmlLang%2A> propriedade retorna um escopo de `en-us` indicando que o nó está no escopo de um `xml:lang="en-us"` atributo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType" /> information for the current node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as informações <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType" /> para o nó atual.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType" /> object; default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType" /> objeto; o padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.XmlType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Eis as observações importantes a considerar ao usar o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.XmlType%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.XmlType%2A> property is `null`, unless the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo.Validity%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SchemaInfo%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is set to <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidity.Valid?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.XmlType%2A> é de propriedade `null`, a menos que o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo.Validity%2A> propriedade do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SchemaInfo%2A> propriedade do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> é definido como <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidity.Valid?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: If this node is valid, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.XmlType%2A> property is the same as the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo.SchemaType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SchemaInfo%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>, unless this node is a member of a union.
trans-unit.target: Se o nó for válido, o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.XmlType%2A> propriedade é igual a <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo.SchemaType%2A> propriedade do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SchemaInfo%2A> propriedade do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>, a menos que este nó é um membro de uma união.

trans-unit.source: If this node is a member of a union, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.XmlType%2A> property is the same as the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo.MemberType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SchemaInfo%2A> property of this <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: Se o nó for um membro de uma união, o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.XmlType%2A> propriedade é o mesmo que o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo.MemberType%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SchemaInfo%2A> propriedade deste <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
